definitions.definition: A spread , manufactured from a blend of vegetable oils (some of which are hydrogenated ), emulsifiers etc, mostly used as a substitute for butter .
The solid ingredient of human fat , olive oil , etc.

main_definition: A spread , manufactured from a blend of vegetable oils (some of which are hydrogenated ), emulsifiers etc, mostly used as a substitute for butter .
secondary_definitions: ( dated ) The solid ingredient of human fat , olive oil , etc.
